result.relevanceClues: The episode is centered around 20 aspiring restaurateurs presenting their signature dishes to Ramsay, making this episode highly relevant to the Food & Drink category.

The challenge winners earn a night out on the town in Las Vegas, while the losers must head back to Los Angeles on a school bus. This aspect of the episode makes it somewhat relevant to the Travel category.
